ruling: - If a [[Sangan]] or a [[Witch of the Black Forest]] equipped with [[Horn of Light]] is Tributed and you activate the effect of [[Horn of Light]], [[Horn of Light]] goes on top of your Deck and then [[Sangan]] or [[Witch of the Black Forest]] is resolved.  If [[Sangan]] is destroyed (not Tributed) the effects of [[Sangan]] and [[Horn of Light]] are simultaneous and form a chain.
